languages.text: "Остановись, паломни{mf|к|ца}. Здесь нет твоих врагов, ибо скверна ереси не тронула наше братство".
"Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."
languages.original_text: "Остановись, паломни{mf|к|ца}. Здесь нет твоих врагов, ибо скверна ереси не тронула наше братство".

traits.locale_text: "Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."
"Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."
"Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."
"Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."
"Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."
"Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."

languages.text: "Halt, {mf|Pilger|Pilgerin}. Ihr habt hier keine Feinde, denn die Verderbnis der Ketzerei hat unsere Bruderschaft nicht berührt."
languages.original_text: "Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: "Halt, {mf|Pilger|Pilgerin}. Ihr habt hier keine Feinde, denn die Verderbnis der Ketzerei hat unsere Bruderschaft nicht berührt."

languages.text: « Halte ! Vous n'avez pas d'ennemis ici, {mf|pèlerin|pèlerine}... La corruption hérétique n'a pas atteint notre fraternité. »
languages.original_text: "Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: « Halte ! Vous n'avez pas d'ennemis ici, {mf|pèlerin|pèlerine}... La corruption hérétique n'a pas atteint notre fraternité. »

languages.text: “住手，朝圣者。我们不是你的敌人，异端的腐化并没有触及到我们的兄弟。”
languages.original_text: "Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: “住手，朝圣者。我们不是你的敌人，异端的腐化并没有触及到我们的兄弟。”

languages.text: 「止まれ、巡礼者よ。ここには、お前の敵などいない。異端の腐敗は我々の仲間に及んでいないのだから」
languages.original_text: "Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: 「止まれ、巡礼者よ。ここには、お前の敵などいない。異端の腐敗は我々の仲間に及んでいないのだから」

languages.text: «Deténgase, peregrino. Aquí no tiene enemigos, pues la corrupción de la herejía no ha tocado a nuestra hermandad».
languages.original_text: "Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: «Deténgase, peregrino. Aquí no tiene enemigos, pues la corrupción de la herejía no ha tocado a nuestra hermandad».

languages.text: "Ey hacı, dur. Buradakiler düşmanın değil. Kâfirliğin yozluğu, kardeşliğimize tesir etmedi."
languages.original_text: "Stop, pilgrim. You have no enemies here, for the corruption of heresy has not touched our fraternity."

traits.locale_text: "Seyyah, bekle. Buradakiler senin düşmanın değil. Kâfirliğin yozluğu, kardeşliğimize tesir etmedi."
